trans-unit.source: List Shares
trans-unit.target: List Shares

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Shares</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation returns a list of the shares under the specified account.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Shares</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation returns a list of the shares under the specified account.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Shares</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Shares</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> request may be constructed as follows.

trans-unit.source: HTTPS is recommended.
trans-unit.target: HTTPS is recommended.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: HTTP Version
trans-unit.target: HTTP Version

trans-unit.source: HTTP/1.1
trans-unit.target: HTTP/1.1

trans-unit.source: Replace the path components shown in the request URI with your own, as follows:
trans-unit.target: Replace the path components shown in the request URI with your own, as follows:

trans-unit.source: Path Component
trans-unit.target: Path Component

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: myaccount
trans-unit.target: myaccount

trans-unit.source: The name of your storage account.
trans-unit.target: The name of your storage account.

trans-unit.source: For details on path naming restrictions, see <link xlink:href="f38d4c69-cb50-4ef3-a8a3-276341689769" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Naming and Referencing Shares, Directories, Files, and Metadata</link>.
trans-unit.target: For details on path naming restrictions, see <link xlink:href="f38d4c69-cb50-4ef3-a8a3-276341689769" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Naming and Referencing Shares, Directories, Files, and Metadata</link>.

trans-unit.source: URI Parameters
trans-unit.target: URI Parameters

trans-unit.source: The following additional parameters may be specified on the request URI.
trans-unit.target: The following additional parameters may be specified on the request URI.

trans-unit.source: Parameter
trans-unit.target: Parameter

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Filters the results to return only shares whose name begins with the specified prefix.
trans-unit.target: Filters the results to return only shares whose name begins with the specified prefix.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: A string value that identifies the portion of the list to be returned with the next list operation.
trans-unit.target: A string value that identifies the portion of the list to be returned with the next list operation.

trans-unit.source: The operation returns a marker value within the response body if the list returned was not complete.
trans-unit.target: The operation returns a marker value within the response body if the list returned was not complete.

trans-unit.source: The marker value may then be used in a subsequent call to request the next set of list items.
trans-unit.target: The marker value may then be used in a subsequent call to request the next set of list items.

trans-unit.source: The marker value is opaque to the client.
trans-unit.target: The marker value is opaque to the client.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the maximum number of shares to return.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the maximum number of shares to return.

trans-unit.source: If the request does not specify <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference>, or specifies a value greater than 5,000, the server will return up to 5,000 items.
trans-unit.target: If the request does not specify <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference>, or specifies a value greater than 5,000, the server will return up to 5,000 items.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter is set to a value less than or equal to zero, the server will return status code 400 (Bad Request).
trans-unit.target: If the parameter is set to a value less than or equal to zero, the server will return status code 400 (Bad Request).

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: Include this parameter to return the metadata of the share as part of the response body.
trans-unit.target: Include this parameter to return the metadata of the share as part of the response body.

trans-unit.source: All metadata names must adhere to the naming conventions for <externalLink><linkText>C# identifiers</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa664670(VS.71).aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All metadata names must adhere to the naming conventions for <externalLink><linkText>C# identifiers</linkText><linkUri>http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/aa664670(VS.71).aspx</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Optional.
trans-unit.target: Optional.

trans-unit.source: The timeout parameter is expressed in seconds.
trans-unit.target: The timeout parameter is expressed in seconds.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="2ea86972-4df0-4b87-97fd-3c88910c15e0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for File Service Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="2ea86972-4df0-4b87-97fd-3c88910c15e0" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Setting Timeouts for File Service Operations</link>.

trans-unit.target: Required for all authenticated requests.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body in XML format.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body in XML format.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="4421ac96-38eb-4ea3-8104-f9975c3bf153" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.target: Response Headers

trans-unit.source: The response for this operation includes the following headers.
trans-unit.target: The response for this operation includes the following headers.

trans-unit.source: The response also includes additional standard HTTP headers.
trans-unit.target: The response also includes additional standard HTTP headers.

trans-unit.source: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: All standard headers conform to the <externalLink><linkText>HTTP/1.1 protocol specification</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=150478</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: Response header
trans-unit.target: Response header

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: Standard HTTP/1.1 header.
trans-unit.target: Standard HTTP/1.1 header.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the format in which the results are returned.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the format in which the results are returned.

trans-unit.source: Currently, this value is application/xml.
trans-unit.target: Currently, this value is application/xml.

trans-unit.source: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.
trans-unit.target: This header uniquely identifies the request that was made and can be used for troubleshooting the request.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="b20a45d8-7453-487c-b492-69dc5a5b6d2d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Troubleshooting API Operations</link>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the version of the File service used to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Indicates the version of the File service used to execute the request.

trans-unit.source: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.
trans-unit.target: A UTC date/time value generated by the service that indicates the time at which the response was initiated.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: The format of the response body is as follows.
trans-unit.target: The format of the response body is as follows.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Prefix</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>Marker</languageKeyword>, and <languageKeyword>MaxResults</languageKeyword> elements are only present if they were specified on the URI.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Prefix</languageKeyword>, <languageKeyword>Marker</languageKeyword>, and <languageKeyword>MaxResults</languageKeyword> elements are only present if they were specified on the URI.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> element has a value only if the list results are not complete.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> element has a value only if the list results are not complete.

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Metadata</languageKeyword> element is present only if the <parameterReference>include=metadata</parameterReference> parameter was specified on the URI.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Metadata</languageKeyword> element is present only if the <parameterReference>include=metadata</parameterReference> parameter was specified on the URI.

trans-unit.source: Within the <languageKeyword>Metadata</languageKeyword> element, the value of each name-value pair is listed within an element corresponding to the pair's name.
trans-unit.target: Within the <languageKeyword>Metadata</languageKeyword> element, the value of each name-value pair is listed within an element corresponding to the pair's name.

trans-unit.source: Sample Response
trans-unit.target: Sample Response

trans-unit.source: See the <legacyLink xlink:href="#samplerequestandresponse" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Sample Request and Response</legacyLink> section later in this topic.
trans-unit.target: See the <legacyLink xlink:href="#samplerequestandresponse" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Sample Request and Response</legacyLink> section later in this topic.

trans-unit.source: Authorization
trans-unit.target: Authorization

trans-unit.source: Only the account owner may call this operation.
trans-unit.target: Only the account owner may call this operation.

trans-unit.source: If you specify a value for the <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference> parameter and the number of shares to return exceeds this value, or exceeds the default value for <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference>, the response body will contain a <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> element that indicates the next share to return on a subsequent request.
trans-unit.target: If you specify a value for the <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference> parameter and the number of shares to return exceeds this value, or exceeds the default value for <parameterReference>maxresults</parameterReference>, the response body will contain a <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> element that indicates the next share to return on a subsequent request.

trans-unit.source: To return the next set of items, specify the value of <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> as the marker parameter on the URI for the subsequent request.
trans-unit.target: To return the next set of items, specify the value of <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> as the marker parameter on the URI for the subsequent request.

trans-unit.source: Note that the value of <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> should be treated as opaque.
trans-unit.target: Note that the value of <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> should be treated as opaque.

trans-unit.source: Shares are listed in alphabetical order in the response body.
trans-unit.target: Shares are listed in alphabetical order in the response body.

trans-unit.source: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Shares</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation times out after 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: The <unmanagedCodeEntityReference>List Shares</unmanagedCodeEntityReference> operation times out after 30 seconds.

trans-unit.source: Sample Request and Response
trans-unit.target: Sample Request and Response

trans-unit.source: The following sample URI requests the list of shares for an account, setting the maximum results to return for the initial operation to 3.
trans-unit.target: The following sample URI requests the list of shares for an account, setting the maximum results to return for the initial operation to 3.

trans-unit.source: The request is sent with these headers:
trans-unit.target: The request is sent with these headers:

trans-unit.source: The status code and response headers are returned as follows:
trans-unit.target: The status code and response headers are returned as follows:

trans-unit.source: The response XML for this request is as follows.
trans-unit.target: The response XML for this request is as follows.

trans-unit.source: Note that the <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> element follows the set of shares and includes the name of the next share to be returned.
trans-unit.target: Note that the <languageKeyword>NextMarker</languageKeyword> element follows the set of shares and includes the name of the next share to be returned.

trans-unit.source: The subsequent list operation specifies the marker on the request URI, as follows.
trans-unit.target: The subsequent list operation specifies the marker on the request URI, as follows.

trans-unit.source: The next set of results is returned beginning with the share specified by the marker.
trans-unit.target: The next set of results is returned beginning with the share specified by the marker.
